    • ignoredCornersByDirection

      private static final int[][] ignoredCornersByDirection
      Represents an array of corners that are ignored when performing a ray trace of a straight stairs block.

      The numbers stored in the inner arrays refer to the following corners that will be ignored:

      • 0 - Lower-North-West
      • 1 - Lower-North-East
      • 2 - Lower-South-West
      • 3 - Lower-South-East
      • 4 - Upper-North-West
      • 5 - Upper-North-East
      • 6 - Upper-South-West
      • 7 - Upper-South-East
      Mappings:
      Namespace Name Mixin selector
      official O Laju;O:[[I
      intermediary field_323 Lnet/minecraft/class_188;field_323:[[I
      named ignoredCornersByDirection Lnet/minecraft/block/StairsBlock;ignoredCornersByDirection:[[I

    • onUse

      Runs when the block is used, i.e. right clicked in most cases. It is similar to the same method in Item, but this method is called only when the player uses it when the block is placed, not when the player is holding the BlockItem.
